moreBlocks.lawyersAtWhitleyLawFirmSelectedForASuper: • Whitley, Robert E. On a Super Lawyers® List

description:
At the Whitley Law Firm in Raleigh, North Carolina, our attorneys have over 80 years of combined experience serving our clients who have received serious injuries due to the negligence or wrongdoing of others. Our nine convenient offices in Raleigh, Charlotte, Durham, Greensboro, Grenville, Jacksonville, Kinston, New Bern and Winston-Salem make us the perfect choice for injury victims seeking the best available legal services in North Carolina.

We know that when our clients come to us, their lives have been turned upside down by an unexpected injury. They are hurt, both physically and emotionally, often frightened and out of work, and need compassionate and responsive legal guidance. That is exactly what the Whitley Law Firm does best: Help our clients obtain the just compensation they deserve in the following areas:

• Motor vehicle accidents: car, truck, motorcycle, pedestrian
• Construction accidents
• Medical malpractice
• Products liability: dangerous drugs, defective medical devices
• Nursing home abuse
• Premises liability: serious slips and falls, dog bites

In addition, we are well-versed in workers' compensation and Social Security Disability. We likewise represent grieving families whose loved ones suffered wrongful deaths at the hands of another.

Outstanding Client Service

Our attorneys have the education, knowledge, skill and experience to help our clients through this most difficult time in their lives. Our law firm offers free initial consultations and never charges a fee unless and until we obtain satisfactory compensation for our injured clients.
